titles.title: Ask in faith, the Name of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: “Ask in faith,” the Name of Jesus All your plea before the throne; As you trust, the Lord will whisper, “See, my child, the work is done.”

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: “Ask in faith,” God waits to answer Each petition, Spirit-wrought; He will work in wondrous power, Far beyond your highest thought.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: “Ask in faith,” ’tis just the asking, In a faith that dares to stand, Full of joyful expectation, With an open, outstretched hand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: “Ask in faith,” for God is waiting For thy faith-filled, earnest prayer. Faith delights Him; faith can touch Him, Every moment, everywhere.
